meanings.definition: A synthetic antibacterial and antiprotozoal drug used to treat bacterial and protozoal infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed furazolidones to fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: She bought furazolidones from the pharmacy to treat her illness.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were no match for the powerful furazolidones.
meanings.sent4: Her body welcomed furazolidones like a shield against the invading germs.
meanings.sent5: The furazolidones worked tirelessly to combat the harmful bacteria.

meanings.definition: The plural form of furazolidone, referring to multiple doses or types of the drug.
meanings.sent1: The hospital stocked up on furazolidones for various patients.
meanings.sent2: They administered different furazolidones to each group of infected individuals.
meanings.sent3: The shelves were filled with colorful furazolidones, like a rainbow of healing.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against infections, furazolidones were the soldiers fighting on multiple fronts.
meanings.sent5: The variety of furazolidones available ensured effective treatment for all cases.
